# Changelog

All Notable changes to `laravel-translation-loader` will be documented in this file

## 1.1.0 - 2016-01-23

- add compatibility with Laravel 5.4

## 1.0.1 - 2016-10-10

- fix exception when using `setTranslation` on a fresh instance of `LanguageLine`

## 1.0.0 - 2016-10-07

- initial release
